_source.text: A favored interview as a car owner because of his passion for Indy, perhaps none captured better than by Gary Gerould on Pit Road in 1993 (advance to the 5:55 mark of the video, or just watch the whole classic build-up) moments after the the traditional build-up and command had been given and the cars begin to pull away...
